Description.Text: An attacker targets a specific individual or organization with a fraudulent communication that appears to come from a trusted source. The attacker uses information about the target to craft a convincing message that tricks the victim into revealing sensitive information or executing malicious code.

Prerequisites.Description: The attacker must know something about the target to make the phishing email convincing
The target must have an email account

Consequences.Description: The attacker can steal credentials or sensitive information
The attacker can execute malware on the victim's system

Description.Text: An attacker sends a fraudulent communication that appears to come from a trusted source. The communication tricks the victim into revealing sensitive information or executing malicious code.

Prerequisites.Description: The target must have an email account

Description.Text: An attacker exploits the way applications process data by inputting more data than the buffer is designed to hold. This causes the overflow to write data beyond the buffer boundaries, potentially overwriting adjacent memory and causing the program to crash or allowing arbitrary code execution.

Prerequisites.Description: The target application must use a buffer to store data
The application must not properly validate input size

Consequences.Description: Arbitrary code execution on the target system
Denial of service by crashing the application

Description.Text: An attacker injects arbitrary OS commands into the input stream of a vulnerable application. The application fails to properly neutralize the input, allowing the injected commands to be executed with the privileges of the application.

Prerequisites.Description: The target application must accept user input
The application must pass user input to an OS command processor

Description.Text: An attacker injects SQL commands into input fields, which are then executed by the application's database. This allows the attacker to bypass authentication, extract data, modify data, or execute administrative operations.

Prerequisites.Description: The target application must accept user input
The application must construct SQL queries from user input without proper sanitization
